ygData.subject: Re: lang list
ygData.msgSnippet: I would assume there is aviak and centaur, but I have yet to see any (even though these creatures exist in game). Zolthar ... people you can respond too yanno.
ygData.messageBody:
I would assume there is aviak and centaur, but I have yet to see any (even
though these creatures exist in game).

Zolthar

>From: Tony Williams <vincedis@...>

>This is my new and improved list. any more additions and hey you digest
people you can respond too yanno. I'm in

to get it as complete as possible.
>thanks again
>
>Tony
